Your Last Chance for Exclusive Savings!
Sign your contract by December 15 to receive low community pricing!
Exclusive savings end on December 15. Act now!
Enrollment for the extended special group pricing from Astrum Solar has ended. Thank you for your interest in the program! If you are considering switching to solar with Astrum Solar, you have until December 15 to sign your contract and take advantage of the low community pricing provided by the program.
You do not want to miss out on these savings. Please consider joining the Torrington families who have already decided to go solar in the program. Now is the best time to go solar!
Ready to switch to solar? Here is the next step. Contact your Solar Consultant today to discuss your system and move forward with signing your contract by December 15. Astrum Solar makes switching to solar easy, turnkey and worry-free. Let us help you start saving today!
Have a general question? Contact Jill Appel at jill.appel@astrumsolar.com.
